amendment.description: Amendment requires that any physician, dentist, non-physician prescriber or pharmacist who becomes a member of the Pain Management Best Practices Inter-Agency Task Force shall currently be licensed and practicing in their appropriate State.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 114-551 to require that any physician, dentists, non-physician prescriber or pharmacist who becomes a member of the Pain Management Best Practices Inter-Agency Task Force shall currently be licensed and practicing in their appropriate State.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brooks (IN) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brooks (IN) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mrs. Brooks (IN).
